about.title: About Me
about.description: I'm a results-driven Mobile and Web Developer with over three years of experience crafting scalable, secure, and responsive solutions using MVVM, CI/CD pipelines, and PWA standards. Skilled in Kotlin, Java, Swift, HTML5, CSS3, Bootstrap, and modern JavaScript frameworks, I leverage containerization, automated testing, and performance optimization to deliver seamless user experiences.

profile.title: Adrian Garcia
profile.subtitle: Software Engineer
profile.description: Code lover & problem solver. I build web apps and native apps with clean architecture and smooth UX. Always tinkering with new tech to make things faster and smarter.

project1.description: Security application with biometric authentication to enhance banking security.

project2.description: Modern web application for task management with real-time synchronization.

project3.title: Language Learning Platform
project3.description: Mobile platform for language learning with interactive lessons and gamification.

project4.title: Modern Blog Platform
project4.description: Blogging platform with advanced editor and real-time comment system.

job1.description: Responsible for developing native Android and iOS applications, collaborating with cross-functional teams to deliver new features, ensuring code quality through unit testing, and implementing security enhancements.

about.title: Acerca de mí
about.description: Soy un Desarrollador Móvil y Web orientado a resultados con más de tres años de experiencia creando soluciones escalables, seguras y responsivas utilizando MVVM, pipelines CI/CD y estándares PWA. Con habilidades en Kotlin, Java, Swift, HTML5, CSS3, Bootstrap y frameworks modernos de JavaScript, aprovecho la containerización, pruebas automatizadas y optimización de rendimiento para ofrecer experiencias de usuario perfectas.

profile.title: Adrian Garcia
profile.subtitle: Ingeniero de Software
profile.description: Amante del código y solucionador de problemas. Construyo aplicaciones web y nativas con arquitectura limpia y UX fluida. Siempre experimentando con nuevas tecnologías para hacer las cosas más rápidas e inteligentes.
